sheet-roll-modifier-option-desc: 캐릭터 시트에서 주사위 아이콘을 눌렀을 때 사용할 수정치 옵션을 고릅니다.
sheet-chat-roll-dislpay-option-desc: 굴림 결과가 채팅창에 어떻게 보일지 선택합니다. 롤템플릿이 작동하지 않기 때문에 개인 기능 실력 해제는 개인에게만 보이는 것이 기본으로 설정되어있습니다.
sheet-basic-speed-button-option-desc: 기본 속력 버튼이 채팅창에 어떻게 보일지 선택합니다.
sheet-enter-unspent-points-desc: 체크시, 미사용 CP를 보여주는 텍스트 창을 보여줍니다. 체크하지 않으면 미사용 CP는 총 CP 창에서 확인할 수 있습니다.
sheet-use-malfunction-desc: 체크시, 고장 규칙에 대한 롤테이블이 체크됩니다.
sheet-critical-successes-option-desc: 기능 판정에서 대성공을 판별하는 옵션을 고릅니다.
sheet-show-minimum-damage-type-notes-des: 체크시, 최소 대미지 타입 메모가 피해 굴림에 추가됩니다
sheet-show-damage-type-notes-desc: 체크시, 피해 유형 노트가 피해 굴림에 추가됩니다
sheet-penalty-per-spell-maintained-desc: Enter a negative integer for the penalty.
sheet-show-casting-details-desc: 체크시, 주문의 시전 시간, 지속 시간, 에너지, 저항, 등급같은 자세한 내용이 판정 결과 템플릿에 표시됩니다.
sheet-point-summary-layout-option-desc: 포인트 총합 표를 어떻게 보여줄지에 대한 옵션을 고릅니다.
sheet-show-old-techniques-desc: 체크시 기존의 테크닉 표를 볼 수 있습니다.
sheet-show-new-techniques-desc: 체크시 개정 테크닉 표를 볼 수 있습니다.
sheet-show-raw-defense-notes-desc: If checked, show Rules as Written (RAW) for Active Defense success/fail notes.
night-vision-tooltip: 이 값은 빛이 전혀 없는 상황을 제외한 어둠 패널티를 무효화합니다. 기본 p.51 참조.
dark-vision-tooltip: 활성 시, 암흑 시각은 모든 어둠 페널티를 무효화합니다. 레이더나 소나 등 빛 외의 방법으로 앞을 볼 수 있습니다. 기본 p.47 참조.
used-to-blindness-tooltip: 실명 상태에 익숙할 경우 최대 가시성 페널티는 -6입니다. 기본 p.124, 394 참조
high-pain-threshold-tooltip: 활성 시, 고통에 강함은 모든 쇼크 페널티를 무효화하고 고통으로 인한 패널티를 줄여줍니다. 기본 p.40 참조.
low-pain-threshold-tooltip: 활성 시, 고통에 약함은 쇼크 패널티와 고통 패널티를 2배로 늘립니다. 기본 p.122 참조.
ranged-elevation-label: Elevation. If you're above the target, enter a positive number of hexes. If you're below the target, enter a negative number of hexes. See B407.
range-speed-tooltip: Enter the range of target and factor in relative speed if target crosses path of shooter. See B372.
aiming-bonus-tooltip: Each turn after the initial aim, you get an additional bonus. See B364
rate-of-fire-tooltip:
Rate of Fire
The maximum number of shots that can be fired in
one turn (by a regular person).
The minimum number of shots is 1.

!: minimum RoF is 1/4 of the maximum, rounded up.
mxn: fires the first number of shots, which each then
split into the second number (eg. shotguns)
Jet: shoots a continuous stream of fluid. See page 106.
scope-bonus-tooltip:
Each turn after the initial aim, you get an additional bonus up to the scope's bonus.
Fixed scopes, aim at least as many turns as the scope's bonus.
See B412
vehicle-targeting-tooltip: 차량 조준 시스템의 조준 보너스입니다. 기본 p.469 참조.
laser-sight-tooltip: Laser sight gives +1 to hit.NOTE: If target can see aiming dot, they got +1 dodge! See B412
targeting-systems-description: Combined totals from all targeting systems can't exceed weapon's base Accuracy. See B364
target-ranged-size-modifier-tooltip: 목표의 크기 수정치입니다. 공격 부위, 붙잡기, 방패, 갑옷 틈새 등의 수정치를 적용한 이후에 적용됩니다.
target-melee-size-modifier-tooltip:
Size Modifier of target, which will then be substracted by your size modifier to get a final Relative Size Modifier.
The modifier is applied AFTER location, grapple, shield, chinks in armor have been applied.
For information on Relative SM see http://www.sjgames.com/gurps/faq/FAQ4-3.html#SS3.4.2.23
hit-location-type-tooltip:
Use the drop-downs to select a hit location or enter a value manually. See B552-555.
Humanoid Low Tech, see LT100-103.
Martial Arts, see MA137
grapple-tooltip: 붙잡기는 명중 부위 페널티를 반감합니다. 기본 p.370 참조.
has-shield-tooltip: Apply additional penalty to limb for carrying a shield. Can be applied to arm, leg, foot, pincer, wing, or tail.
chinks-in-armor-tooltip: Target chinks in the armor for the hit location. -8 to torso, -10 to other locations. DR is halved. See B400.
light-cover-tooltip: 가벼운 엄폐물을 뚫고 사격하는 경우 명중 판정에 -2를 받습니다. 기본 p.548 참조
target-prone-tooltip: If target is crouching, kneeling, sitting, or lying down, apply -2 to hit torso, groin, or legs.
partly-exposed-tooltip: 대상이나 공격부위가 일부만 노출되어있을 경우, 명중 판정에 -2의 페널티를 추가로 받습니다. 기본 p.548 참조.
intervening-figures-tooltip: 자신과 상대 사이에 끼어있는 대상의 수를 적습니다. 대상 하나당 -4의 페널티를 받습니다. 기본 p.548 참조.
step-attack-tooltip: Melee Attack. Movement: Step. Active Defense: Any. See B365
step-feint-tooltip: Feint. Contest of melee weapon skills, defender is at -1 defense per point you win by. Lasts one second! Movement: Step. Active Defense: Any, but if you parry with unbalanced, you may not attack. See B365
move-attack-tooltip: During or after your move, make a single, poorly aimed attack – either unarmed or with a ready weapon. Max skill of 9. Movement: normal, but -2 to avoid obstacles. Active Defense: Dodge or Block. See B365-366
move-wild-tooltip:
Move and Wild Swing! During or after your move, make a single, wild swing/thrust – either unarmed or with a ready weapon.
Max skill of 9.
Melee attack to your side, back, or unseen target. If visibility penalty is higher, use that penalty instead, do not use this one. Roll hit location randomly! See B388-389
Movement: normal, but -2 to avoid obstacles
Active Defense: Dodge or Block
See B365-366
move-slam-tooltip: End your move with a slam. If using shield, add your shield's Defense Bonus to your damage roll. Movement: normal, but -2 to avoid obstacles. Active Defense: Dodge or Block. B371-372
flying-tackle-tooltip: End your move with a flying tackle, get 1 yard of extra movement and you become prone. At least two legs and one free arm. Can use Jumping to hit target. Movement: normal, but -2 to avoid obstacles. Active Defense: Dodge or Block. See B371-372
pounce-tooltip: As slam, get 1 yard of extra movement. Roll DX, Acrobatics, or Jumping to avoid falling prone. If a mount, rider must roll Riding-4 or fall off! Must have four or more legs. Movement: normal, but -2 to avoid obstacles. Active Defense: Dodge or Block. See B371-372
no-all-out-attack-tooltip: 전력 공격 안 함, 전력 공격을 취소할 때 선택하십시오.
all-out-attack-determined-tooltip: Determined: Make a single attack at +4 to hit! Movement: half-move, forward only. Defense: None. See B365
all-out-attack-double-tooltip: Two attacks against a single foe! Two ready weapons or one weapon that doesn't need to be readied after an attack. Apply handedness for 2nd weapon. Movement: half-move, forward only. Defense: None. See B365
all-out-attack-feint-tooltip: Feint and attack a single foe! Contest of melee weapon skills, defender is at -1 defense per point you win by. Lasts one second! Movement: half-move, forward only. Defense: None. See B365
all-out-attack-strong-tooltip: Single attack with +2 to damage or +1 damage per die for ST-based weapons! Movement: half-move, forward only. Defense: None. See B365
deceptive-strike-tooltip: Deceptive strike, effective skill can't go below 10! See B369-370.
evaluate-tooltip: Evaluate a visible target that you can melee attack. Movement: Any. Defense: Any, doesn't spoil evaluate. See B364-365.
wild-swing-tooltip: 옆, 뒤, 혹은 보이지 않는 대상에게 근거리 공격을 합니다. 가시성 페널티가 더 크다면 그 페널티를 대신 사용하고, 이 페널티는 사용하지 마십시오. 결과 실력이 9를 넘을 수 없습니다. 명중 부위는 무작위로 굴립니다! 기본 p.388-389 참조
rapid-strike-tooltip: 각 공격에 -6의 페널티를 받고 2번 공격합니다. 여러 적을 공격할 수도 있습니다. 준비된 무기가 있어야 합니다. 공격 횟수가 1번보다 많을 경우(추가타라든지, 추가 공격 장점이라든지), 그중 하나의 공격만 연속공격으로 바꿀 수 있습니다. 기본 p.370 참조.
flurry-of-blows-tooltip: Flurry of Blows for 1 FP per attack. Similar to Rapid Strike, you make two attacks at -3 each, you may attack multiple opponents. You must have a ready weapon. If you have more than one attack, like all-out attack double, you can replace one of the attacks with rapid strike. Can't be combined with Mighty Blow. See B357
rapid-strike-master-tooltip: 고수의 제자 혹은 무기의 달인 장점이 있습니다. 두 공격에 각각 -3의 페널티를 받고, 여러 적을 공격할 수 있습니다. 준비된 무기가 있어야 합니다. 공격 횟수가 1번보다 많을 경우(추가타라든지, 추가 공격 장점이라든지), 그중 하나의 공격만 연속공격으로 바꿀 수 있습니다. 기본 p.370, 547 참조.
attack-from-above-tooltip: Roll contest of Stealth vs Vision (-2 if not looking up). If you win, target is surprised and gets No defense and may freeze. If you lose, target is at -2 defense. If target is aware they could use stop-thrust. You suffer falling damage. Optional do falling damage to target. See B400
mighty-blow-tooltip: Mighty Blow does extra damage for 1 FP per attack. Can't be combined with Flurry of Blows. See B357.
posture-tooltip: 공격할 당시의 자세입니다. 기본 p.547 참조.
height-difference-tooltip: 공격자와 방어자가 서로 다른 높이에 있을 경우, 수직 높이 차이가 전투에 영향을 줍니다. 기본 p.402 참조
tactics-tooltip: NOTE! from Dungeon Fantasy. A teammate spends turn to observe and advise you. If accepted, roll friends tactics. Success: +1 hit. Critical Success: +2. Fail: -1 hit. Critical Fail: -2 hit. See DF Exploits 57.
backstab-tooltip: NOTE! from Dungeon Fantasy. At start of combat, make Stealth roll. If successful, get backstab bonus. See DF Exploits 57-58
single-dual-weapon-tooltip: Select your hand and if you're using a dual weapon attack. NOTE: Don't use off-hand of you have ambidexterity.
off-hand-training-tooltip: Off-Hand weapon training. Negates the penalty for using an off-hand weapon. NOTE: A better approach is adding an off-hand attack to your combat table. See B232
dual-weapon-training-tooltip: Dual-Weapon training. Negates the penalty for using a dual-weapon. NOTE: A better approach is adding an dual-weapon attacks to your combat table. See B230
mounted-description: 승용동물을 타고 있을 땐 무기 기능과 기수 기능 중 더 낮은 쪽을 사용합니다. 기본 p.397 참조
riding-skill-difference-tooltip:
The difference between your riding skill and weapon skill.
NOTE: You could place an attack on the melee table and use riding skill instead of melee weapon skill.
mount-attacked-tooltip: 지난 턴에 승용동물이 공격받았다면 다음 내 명중 굴림에 -2를 받습니다. 기본 p.397 참조
mount-velocity-tooltip:
If mount's relative velocity to target is 7, apply +1 damage, -1 to hit.
NOTE: Lances have special damage rules.
See B397
ranged-move-attack-tooltip: 이동 중 장거리 무기 공격을 하면, 조준이 불가능하고 기존의 조준 보너스를 모두 잃습니다. 명중 굴림에 -2 또는 덩치 패널티 중 더 낮은 쪽을 사용합니다. 이동: 제한 없음, 장애물 피하기에 -2. 능동방어: 피하기 또는 막기. 기본 p.365-366 참조
ranged-all-out-attack-determined-tooltip: Determined: Make a single attack at +1 to hit! Movement: half-move, forward only. Defense: None. See B365
ranged-all-out-attack-suppression-fire-t: Take entire turn to spray an area with automatic fire RoF 5+, see Suppression Fire B409! Movement: half-move, forward only. Defense: None. See B365
braced-tooltip:
If you haven't moved and aimed a turn, you may get the braced bonus.
Firearm/crossbow must rest on a sandbag, low wall, car, etc.
One-handed firearm is braced if using two hands.
Two-handed is braced if you're prone and using a bipod. See B364.
pop-up-tooltip:
Allows you to emerge from cover, move no more than one hex, make a ranged attack, and return cover.
Possible with thrown weapon, firearm, or crossbow.
You are susceptible to oppertunity fire, only dodge is allowed. See B390.
in-close-combat-tooltip: 육박전에서 장거리 무기를 사용중일 경우 무기의 덩치만큼의 페널티를 받습니다. 기본 p.391 참조.
damaged-weapon-tooltip: -HP of damage done to weapon last turn. See B548
strength-difference-tooltip: 사용자 ST가 무기 최소 ST보다 낮을 경우, 모자라는 ST만큼이 페널티로 붙습니다. 기본 p.548 참조.
watch-area-tooltip:
Area or line being covered that is within your arc of vision.
NOTE: You only Aim and wait on a single hex!
See B548
check-target-tooltip: Opportunity Fire check target before shooting. See B390.
moving-mount-vehicle-tooltip:
Attacking from moving mount or vehicle.
NOTE:If not stabilized, the total of Accuracy, Aim, Bracing, and Targeting systems can't exceed vehicle's stability rating (SR). See B469 and B548
stability-rating-tooltip: Vehicle's stability rating. Affects Targeting systems.
unstabilized-tooltip: 받침이 없는 무기입니다. 조준 시스템의 최대 보너스가 차량의 안정성을 넘을 수 없습니다. 기본 p.469 참조.
failed-control-roll-tooltip: 지난 턴 차량/동물 조종 판정이 실패했습니다. 실패 차이만큼의 페널티를 받습니다. 기본 p.548 참조
over-under-mount-tooltip: 몸을 노출시키고 차량이나 동물의 옆에 매달려 그 위나 아래로 사격하는 경우 명중 굴림에 -6의 페널티를 받습니다.
vehicle-dodged-tooltip: Vehicle/mount dodged last turn and you're not the operator.
all-out-defense-increased-tooltip: On your turn, you chose to do an all-out defense. Get +2 one active defense.
all-out-defense-double-tooltip: 한 공격에 두 개의 서로 다른 능동방어를 할 수 있습니다. 첫 방어에 실패할 경우 같은 공격에 대해 다른 능동방어로 한 번 더 판정할 수 있습니다. 기본 p.366 참조
moved-attacked-tooltip: 지난 턴에 이동공격을 했을 경우, 피하기와 막기만 할 수 있습니다. 받아내기는 할 수 없습니다. 기본 p.366 참조
defense-crawling-tooltip: 엎드리거나 누워있는 상태라면 방어에 -3 페널티를 받습니다. 기본 p.549 참조
defense-kneeling-tooltip: 무릎을 꿇거나 앉은 상태라면 방어에 -2 페널티를 받습니다. 기본 p.549 참조
attack-from-behind-tooltip: Normally, if attacked from behind, you have no defense. However, if you have Peripheral Vision you can defend at -2. See B391
runaround-attack-tooltip: Your foe starts in front of you and runs behind you and attacks from behind. You can defend at -2. See B391
shield-defense-bonus-tooltip: Apply defense bonus for a shield if attack came the front or from your shield side. See B374.
magic-defense-bonus-tooltip: Magical Defense Bonus, such as the Shield spell, which protects from frontal attacks. See B252.
general-defense-bonus-tooltip: A general defense bonus, such as the Supers Meta-trait (see Supers B34), force field, etc.
retreating-dodge-tooltip: Move away from attacker, at least one yard or up to your step. See B377
retreating-block-parry-tooltip: 공격자에게서 1m내지 한걸음 만큼 물러나며 막기나 받아내기를 합니다. 기본 p.377 참조
retreating-parry-tooltip:
If using Boxing, Judo, Karate, or any fencing skill, you can get a +3 retreating bonus.
Move away from attacker, at least one yard or up to your step. See B377
retreating-flight-tooltip: If flyer can hover, add +1 to defense to retreating defense if you can move 1 hex up or down. See B398
acrobatic-dodge-success-tooltip: If you made a successful acrobatic/aerobatic roll, get +2 to dodge. See B375
acrobatic-dodge-failed-tooltip: If you failed your acrobatic/aerobatic roll, you're at -2 to dodge. See B375
dodge-drop-tooltip:
Only against ranged attacks, drop to the ground and become prone.
Any cover you get does not count against the initial attack.
NOTE: Flying or Swimming is possible but only if a step would take you below concealing terrain. See B377
feverish-defense-tooltip: Spend 1 FP to increase active defense by 2.
offhand-parry-tooltip: Off-Hand weapon parry is at -2. See B549
number-of-parries-tooltip: You can more parry more than once per turn, but each additional parry is at a -4 penalty. See B376
number-of-parries-master-tooltip: If you're Trained by a Master or a Weapon Master, penalties are halved. See B376
defense-improvised-weapon-tooltip: NOTE: Dungeon Fantasy: if parrying with an improvised weapon, apply a penalty. See DF Exploits-37
defense-laser-sight-tooltip: If you can see the laser sight, you get +1 to Dodge. See B548
against-deceptive-attack-tooltip: You're at -1 to defense for every -2 the attacker took to their to hit modifier. See B369
feint-attack-tooltip: You're at a penalty equal to the attacker's margin of victory. See B365
defense-mounted-tooltip: If mounted, defensive penalty is equal to difference between 12 and Riding skill. See B388
defense-hidden-weapon-tooltip: NOTE: From Dungeon Fantasy. If attacked by a hidden weapon, you're at -2 to your first defense. See DF Exploits-58
parrying-knife-tooltip:
If parrying with a knife or dagger is -1. See B548
Suggestion: Add the modifier to your defense skill instead of using checkbox.
parrying-kusari-tooltip:
If parrying with a kusari or whip is -2. See B548
Suggestion: Add the modifier to your defense skill instead of using checkbox.
unarmed-parry-tooltip: Unarmed parry vesus a weapon is -3, unless it's a thrust or you are using Judo or Karate parry. See B548
against-dual-weapon-tooltip: If both attacks hit you, you're at -1 to defend. See B548.
parry-flail-tooltip:
If parrying against a flail, you're at -4 to defend. See B405.
NOTE: You can't parry flails with a fencing weapon.
parry-nunchaku-tooltip:
If parrying against a nunchaku, you're at -2 to defend. See B405.
NOTE: You can't parry nunchaku with a fencing weapon.
block-flail-tooltip: If blocking against a flail, you're at -2 to defend. See B405.
block-nunchaku-tooltip: If blocking against a nunchaku, you're at -1 to defend. See B405.
parry-thrown-weapon-tooltip: Parry -1 against thrown weapon. See B549
parry-thrown-small-weapon-tooltip: If the weapon is 1 pound or less, parry is -2. See B549
trident-dodge-tooltip: NOTE: From Dungeon Fantasy. -1 to dodge a trident. See DF Exploits-97
trident-block-tooltip: NOTE: From Dungeon Fantasy. +1 to block or parry a trident. See DF Exploits-97
cocentration-penalty-tooltip:
Concentration spell penalty
Number of spells: 0.
NOTE: Use options tab to adjust the penalty.
low-mana-tooltip: Only mages can cast spells and all spells are at -5. Critical failures have mild effects or no effect at all. See B235.
burn-hit-points-tooltip: Burn Hit Points instead of FP, but you're -1 to skill per HP. High Pain Threshold has no effect. See B237.
ceremonial-bonus-tooltip:
Ceremonial Magic involves a group of willing assistants. Receive a skill bonus based on how much extra energy you receive.
  • 20% : +1 skill
  • 40% : +2 skill
  • 60% : +3 skill
  • 100% : +4 skill
Add another +1 per additional 100% of required energy.
See B238.
regular-spell-range-tooltip: For regular and area spells apply a penalty of -1 per yard of distance. See B239.
spell-cant-see-touch-tooltip: For regular spells, if you can't see or touch your subject, you're at -5 to skill. See B239.
long-distance-tooltip: 정보 주문이 원거리에서 작동하는 경우 탐색 주문과 같이 이 수정치를 적용하십시오. 일부 장점은 이와 같은 수정치를 사용합니다. 거리값이 두 수정치 사이에 있는 경우 더 높은 값을 적용하십시오. 기본 p.241참조.
natures-strength-description: NOTE: From Dungeon Fantasy. Modifiers to druidic spells. See 2.
stunned-tooltip: If you're stunned, defend at -4. See B420
defense-nauseated-tooltip: If nauseated, you're at -1 to defend. See B428
encumbered-tooltip: Penalty equal to your encumbrance is applied to Dodge, Judo, Karate, or any fencing Parry. See B549
cant-see-attacker-tooltip: If you can't see the target you're at -4. A block or parry requires Hearing-2. See B549
defense-bad-footing-tooltip: Defensive penalty for bad footing. See B547-B549.
distraction-tooltip: -1 for Bees in your face, -2 for part clothes on fire, -3 all clothes on fire, etc. See B548.
grappled-dodge-tooltip: NOTE! from Dungeon Fantasy. If grappled, you're at -1 to dodge. See DF Exploits 41
grappled-block-tooltip: NOTE! from Dungeon Fantasy. If grappled, you're at -2 to block/parry. A grappled limb can't use block/parry. See DF Exploits 41
visibility-roll-modifier-tooltip: Combined total can't exceed -10 or -6 if used to blindness.
no-visiblity-condition-tooltip: Only affected by darkness, smoke, fog, blur, or other.
cannot-see-anything-tooltip: If used to blindess, penalty is -6 and Max Skill is 9. See B124 and B394.
know-location-tooltip: If the foe is in a single smoke-filled hex or the like, no Hearing roll is required and the attack penalty is only -4. Roll for random hit location. Max Skill is 9. B394.
darkness-tooltip: -10 is considered total darkness, no light available. See B394.
obscure-vision-tooltip: -10 totally obscures vision. See Obscure B72.
coughing-sneezing-iq-tooltip: IQ와 IQ 기반 기능에 -1의 페널티를 받습니다. 은밀행동을 사용할 수 없습니다. 기본 p.436 참조.
coughing-sneezing-dx-tooltip: DX와 DX 기반 기능에 -3의 페널티를 받습니다. 은밀행동을 사용할 수 없습니다. 기본 p.436 참조.
drowsy-tooltip: DX, IQ, 자제 판정에 -2를 받습니다. 잠들지 않으려면 2시간마다 의지력 판정을 성공해야 합니다. 기본 p.436 참조.
tipsy-tooltip: DX, IQ, 겁쟁이 단점을 제외한 자제 판정에 -2를 받습니다. 수줍음 단점은 한 단계 낮아집니다. 기본 p.436 참조.
drunk-tooltip: DX, IQ에 -2 페널티, 겁쟁이 단점을 제외한 자제 판정에 -4 페널티를 받습니다. 수줍음 단점은 두 단계 낮아집니다. 기본 p.436 참조.
euphoria-tooltip: DX, IQ, 자제 판정에 -3의 페널티를 받습니다. 기본 p.436 참조.
pain-level-tooltip: Penalty to DX, IQ, and self-control rolls. Hight Pain Threshold halves penalty while Low Pain Threshold doubles the penalty. See B428.
skill-encumbered-tooltip:
Penalty equal to your encumbrance is applied to your skill.
Example: Climbing, Judo, Karate, Fencing Weapons, Stealth.
bad-footing-tooltip: If defense, -1 or more. If attacking/skill, -2 or more. See B547-B549.
shield-close-combat-penalty-label: Close combat with shield: -1 per DB
grappled-tooltip: See Actions after being grappled for more information. See B371.
extra-time-tooltip: Working slowly and deliberately on a noncombat task. See B346.
haste-tooltip: Hurrying the noncombat task. See B346.
unfamiliar-culture-tooltip: -3 to skill with a significant cultural component; Carousing, Connoisseur, Criminology, Dancing, Detect Lies, Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Games, Gesture, etc. See B23.
language-modifier-tooltip:
Based on comprehension, use Task Difficulty for additional modifiers like bad phone connection. See B24.
Language skills: Fast-Talk, Public Speaking, Research, Speed-Reading, teaching, and Writing.
Artistic Skills: Poetry, Singing, etc.
iq-tech-level-modifier-tooltip: IQ-Based skills. When you work with equipment or concepts of a TL different from your own skill, you suffer a penalty. See B168.
non-iq-tech-level-modifier-tooltip: Non IQ-Based skills. Flat penalty of -1 per TL difference. See B168.
available-equipment-tooltip: Equipment modifiers for skills. See B345.
damaged-equipment-tooltip: Damaged equipment modifier, such as -1 for first-aid kit salvaged from a wreck. See B346.
unfamiliar-equipment-tooltip: Any skill used to operate equipment like Driving/TL7 (Autommobile) takes a penalty when faced with an unfamiliar type of item. For instance, you're used to a compact car but you need to drive a van. See B169
size-modifier-strength-warning-message: Warning! Due to your Size Modifier you only need to spend character points ( pts/level) for Strength .
size-modifier-hit-point-warning-message: Warning! Due to your Size Modifier you only need to spend character points ( pts/level) for Hit Points .
size-modifier-striking-st-warning-messag: Warning! Due to your Size Modifier you only need to spend character points ( pts/level) for Striking ST .
size-modifier-lifting-st-warning-message: Warning! Due to your Size Modifier you only need to spend character points ( pts/level) for Lifting ST .

attribute-fright-check-threshold-tooltip:
Fright Check Threshold - Uses Rule of 14 (B360). By default this value is 13.
This means that a roll of 14 or more is automatically a failure.
This Threshold can be modifier by the Perks of Brave (Dungeon Fantasy 11, p11) or Rule of 15
(Power Ups 2, p13).
Will and/or Fright plus bonuses (like Fearlessness or Combat Reflexes) must total 14+ for this
to be useful, of course!
Note: A Fright Check can be used for Awe and Confusion. (Powers p84 under Terror) and the Awe and
Confusion Check Table for failures. (Powers p85).
attribute-unstun-tooltip:
Recover from physical stun, based on Health.
Roll at the end of your turn after Do Nothing
attribute-knock-down-tooltip:
Knockdown and Stunning check (B420), based on HT (Health).
Roll immediately whenever the following happens:
  • You suffer a Major Wound (B420) - This is any single injury that inflicts a wound in excess of ½ your HP.
  • You suffer any Crippling Injury (B420-421).
  • Whenever you are struck in the Head (Skull, Face, or Eye) or Vitals for enough injury to cause a Shock (B419) penalty.
Modifiers:
  • - 5 for a Major Wound (B420) to the Face or Vitals (or to the Groin on a humanoid male).
  • - 10 for a Major Wound (B420) to the Skull or Eye.
attribute-unconscious-check-tooltip:
Unconscious Check, based on Health
If HP zero or less, roll per turn to take an Active Action.
-1 per full multiple of HP below zero.
Hard/Easy to Subdue: Gives +/- per level to Unconscious Check
Fit +1 to Unc. Check . Very Fit +2 to Unc. Check
attribute-death-check-tooltip:

On damage taken: Immediately Roll a Death Check if you are
at-1xHP or more.
Roll again each time you suffer injury equal to a further
multiple of your HP. (-2xHP, -3xHP, -4xHP)
Immediate Death at -5xHP
Hard/Easy to Kill: Gives +/- per level to a Death Check
Fit +1 to Death Check . Very Fit +2 to Death Check

Hit Points - Based on Strength - pts/level

current-hit-points-tooltip:
현재 체력
HP가 낮을 경우 페널티를 받습니다. (기본p.419)
current-hit-points-reeling-description:
- 이동력과 피하기 절반(소수점 올림) (기본p.419)
- 이 효과는 FP손실과 중첩됩니다. GURPS FAQ: 3.4.5.7 참조
- 참고: 이 시트는 해당 효과를 자동 계산하여 적용합니다.
current-hit-points-collaps-description:
- 매 턴 @{VS} HT로 판정하여 실패하면 의식을 잃습니다.
- HP가 0 이하일 경우 -1xHP마다 -1의 페널티를 받습니다.
- 아무 것도 하지 않거나 방어도 하지 않을 경우 판정하지 않아도 됩니다.
current-hit-points-verge-of-death-descri:
- 목숨을 유지하려면 HT로 @{VS} 1번 판정합니다.
- 1이나 2 차이로 실패하면 치명상을 입은 것이고, 죽지는 않습니다. (기본p.423)
- 누적된 부상이
최대 HP의 배수에 달할 때마다 판정합니다.
current-hit-points-total-destruction-des: - 몸이 완전히 파괴되어 알아보거나 되살릴 수도 없습니다.
hit-points-half-move-tooltip: 이동력과 피하기가 HP 손실로 인해 반감됩니다. 기본 p.419 참조.
hit-points-fatigue-quartered-move: 이동력과 피하기가 HP와 FP 손실로 인해 1/4로 감소합니다. 기본 p.419 참조.
current-fatigue-points-tool-tip:
현재 피로도
피로도가 낮으면 페널티를 받습니다. (기본 p.426)
fatigue-points-tired-description:
- 이동력, 피하기, ST를 반감합니다(소수점 올림, 기본 p.426).
- 이 효과는 HP 손실과 중첩됩니다. GURPS FAQ: 3.4.5.7 참조.
- 참고: 이 시트는 해당 효과를 자동 계산하여 적용합니다.
이 값은 ST에 기반한 다른 수치,
HP나 피해량같은 수치에 영향이 없습니다(기본 p.426).
verge-of-collapse-description:
- 피로가 더 쌓이면 잃은 FP마다 1HP의 부상을 입습니다(기본 p.426).
- 말이나 휴식을 제외한 다른 행동을 하려면 의지력 판정을 해야 합니다.
- 의지력 판정에 실패하면 의식을 잃습니다.
- 대실패 시 @{VS} HT 판정을 하여 실패하면 심장마비가 옵니다.
unconscious-description:
- 즉시 의식을 잃습니다.
- FP는 이보다 낮아지지 않지만, HP는 여전히 잃습니다.
- 0FP에서 의식을 회복합니다.
half-move-strength-tooltip:
FP 손실로 인해 이동력, 피하기, ST가 반감됩니다. 기본 p.426 참조.
ST 판정과 무기 최소 ST에 영향을 줍니다.
half-strength-tooltip:

turning-velocity-movement-tooltip: 선회 반경과 감속 페널티를 계산하기 위한 이동 유형을 결정하십시오.
start-velocity-tooltip:
Enter velocity (yards/second) for current turn.
Important: Be sure to check your max allowed velocity based on movement type.
change-in-velocity-tooltip: Amount to accelerate or decelerate for the turn.
final-velocity-tooltip:
Final velocity. Current Velocity - Deceleration.
The final velocity is how you start the turn and is used to
calculate the deceleration penalty, turn radius, and tight turn penalty.
deceleration-penalty-tooltip:
Deceleration Skill penalty to DX roll or operation skill.
Example: Moving 12/second, need to slow to 5/second, deceleration = 12 - 5 = 7.
Can safely decelerate up to base move, no roll needed.
If over safe deceleration, then make DX+3. If in vehicle, use operation skill + handling statistic.
Apply the appropriate skill penalty from the input forms to the right.
How it works: -1 per two full yards/second beyond Basic Move by which you cut your speed.
NOTE: make an additional roll if you're also turning.
Example: Car with move 3/57 traveling at 16 yards/second, needs to decelerate to 6 yards/second.
Driving Skill: 12, Handling: 0.
Total Deceleration = 16 - 6 = 10.
Can safely decelerate to 16 - 3 (base move) = 13.
Penalty = 13 - 6 (goal speed) / 2 = -3.
Making Driving Skill 12 - 3 to succeed.
see B395.
turn-radius-tooltip:
Turn Radius. Minimum number of hexes to move before making a 60° facing change.
Turn Radius = (Final Velocity / Base Move Score) rounded down.
Example: Super Run = 6/24. Final Velocity = 18. Turn Radius = 18/6 = 3.
See B394.
tight-turn-tooltip:
무리한 동작 페널티입니다. 추가적으로 선회할 수 있습니다.
기존 60도에서 120도만큼 선회할 수 있습니다.
페널티 = (기본 이동력 - 현재 속도)/기본 이동력 (나머지 버림)
기본p.395 참조.

1열은 2열과 2열의 값에 기반한 수정치를 알려줍니다.
2열은 수정치 칸입니다. 단계당 1씩 위 아래 방향키로 조정할 수 있습니다.
3열은 CP 칸입니다. 단계당 10CP씩 위 아래 방향키로 조정할 수 있습니다. 각 단계당 도약 거리가 2배씩 늘어납니다.

standing-broad-jump-tooltip:
제자리 멀리 뛰기입니다. 기본 p.352 참조
1번 행 (2 x 사용할 기능) - 3피트 또는 도약 기능/2(소수점 버림).
2번 행 도약할 수 있는 피트를 나타냅니다.
3번 행 도약할 수 있는 야드를 나타냅니다.
공식 = (2 x 사용할 기능) - 3 피트
사용할 기능:
역주: 원문에서는 피트와 야드를 사용하며,
국문 2판에서는 센티미터와 미터를 단위로 사용합니다.
캐릭터 시트는 피트와 야드로 계산되므로, 피트 값에는 65를,
야드 값에는 2를 곱해서 사용해주시기 바랍니다.
running-broad-jump-tooltip:
Running Broad Jump Distance, under Broad Jump decryption. B352
1st column entery how may yards you ran this turn.
2nd column shows you how many feet you may jump.
3rd column shows you how many yard you jump.
Formula = (2 x Stat To use) - 3 feet
Stat to use:
Max running broad jump distance is twice standing broad jump distance.

높이 뛰기입니다. 기본 p.352 참조

3번 행 몇 야드까지 뛸 수 있는지 보여줍니다.
공식 = (6 x 사용할 기능) - 10인치

역주: 원문에서는 피트와 야드를 사용하며,

running-high-jump-tooltip:
도움닫기 높이 뛰기입니다. 기본 p.352 참조

2번 행 도약할 수 있는 피트를 나타냅니다.
3번 행 도약할 수 있는 야드를 나타냅니다.
공식 = (6 x 사용할 기능) - 10 인치

도움닫기 높이 뛰기의 최대 거리는 제자리 높이 뛰기 거리의 2배입니다.
역주: 원문에서는 피트와 야드를 사용하며,

캐릭터 시트는 피트와 야드로 계산되므로, 피트 값에는 65를,

major-wounds-tooltip:
Major wound threshold. Any single injury of greater than 1/2 your HP. If using hit location, any injury that disables a limb is a Major Wound.
Roll HT to avoid Knockdown and Stunning or use the K Down trait on the general tab. See B420.
encumbrance-tooltip: Current encumbrance level. Penalty equal to your encumbrance is applied to Dodge, Judo, Karate, or any fencing Parry. See B549

ALERT: This will delete the current hit locations!
flexible-armor-tooltip:
Flexible Armor If damage fails to penetrate DR, victim suffers blunt trauma.
Cutting, impaling, piercing does 1 HP per full 10 HP damage.
Crushing damage does 1 HP per full 5 HP damage.
If layered armor, only damage that penetrates outer layer inflicts blunt trauma. B379
armor-layers-tooltip: Select the number of armor layers to display.
back-armor-tooltip: Show back armor for each layer.
hit-location-notes-tooltip:
Enter notes and traits here.
Example include adding damage ntoes for Unliving, Homogenous, Diffuse, Unbreakable Bones (Powers 52), Damage Reduction (Powers 52). see B380.
armor-penalty-tooltip:
Penalty to hit this location.
NOTE: Size Modifier is factored in on Applying location type or changing Size Modifier.
armor-layor-tooltip:
Enter DR for this location.
* = flexible
You can split the DR using with these suggested abbreviations.
cr = crush
pi = pierce
cut = cutting
imp = impaling
bu = burning
Alert: To enter a split DR, the first number must be the primary DR, while the second number are the exceptions, this is required in order to know how to split the armor.
armor-layor1-tooltip: "Layer 1 (Inner most) is good for natural DR or concealable armor, such as cloth armor under a breastplate.
armor-layor2-tooltip: Layer 2 is good for your primary armor, like helmet, leather armor, gloves, etc.
armor-layor3-tooltip: Layer 3 is good for force shields, magic DR, etc.
armor-layor4-tooltip: Layer 4 (Outer most) is also good for force shields, magic DR, etc.
armor-summary-tooltip:
This sums up each layer, from layer 1 (inner) to layer 4 (outer).
* = flexible armor.
Alert: Only one layer per row may have split armor.
defense-bonus-tooltip:
Apply the defense bonus of a shield, cloak, spell (B252), or Meta-trait (Supers34). See B374
Shield/Cloak: Used against attacks from front or from your shield side. Can't be used against firearms unless you're using the Damage to Shields option.
Shield Spell: Protects from frontal attacks and is cumulative with a normal shield.

click the option (gear) icon then click SHEET OPTIONS tab.
Check the box labeled Update Hit Points

hitlocation-disabled-tooltip:
Disabled/Crippled Threshold.
If a single injury meets or exceeds this value, the extremity or structure is disabled.
NOTE: In most cases, if disabled/crippled in one injury, the excess damage is lost, except where noted, such as the eyes.
Dismemberment: If injury is twice the threshold, then extremity is destroyed. Cutting or Explosion will sever the limb.
See B421

Enter individual wounds here, if limb is crippled, bleeding, etc.

knockback-save-label: Knockback save vs crushing or cutting attacks
knockback-tooltip:
A crushing attack can cause knockback regardless of whether it penetrates DR.
A cutting attack can cause knockback only if it fails to penetrate DR.
For every full ST-2 damage (BEFORE subtracting DR) target is moved yard away from attacker.
NOTE: If target has no ST score (like a wall) or is not resisting, use HP instead.

If knocked back, Roll against DX, Acrobatics, or Judo.
-1 per yard of knockback AFTER the first yard.
+4 for Perfect Balance. see B378.
If target collides with an object, use yards knocked back to calculate Collisions and Falls (see Combat Tools).
knockback-hitpoints-modifier-tooltip:
Modify the number of hit points required for knockback.
For skinny, special rules, etc.
active-defense-formula-tooltip:

formula-as-is-description: Enter a value or use the linked item value as is.

formula-current-dodge-description: Current Dodge affected by Combat Reflexes, HP, FP, and Encumbrance.

반사마법 장비 갑옷: 몸통 (전방에만), 두개골, 목, 손, 머리(1/6 얼굴), 발에 DB +2.

the damage - eg. (2) - is an armor divisor.

melee-reach-tooltip:
The distance in yards that the weapon can reach.
C: this weapon can be used in close combat.
*: the weapon is awkward, and requires a Ready
maneuver to switch between different reaches.
melee-row-id-tooltip:
Use the melee row id to link an active defense to this skill.
This allows you to use your enhanced skill with this weapon for parries.
modifier-tooltip:
Enter the net value of all modifiers combined.
Can be a positive or a negative number.
Example: Enter 2 for Weapon’s Bond (+1) plus Magic (Accuracy: +1).
Once entered, this will change the Skill/Spell Level for this particular
weapon to match the Base Skill/Spell level plus this MOD (Modifier).
Do not change this level number manually.
armor-divisor-tooltip:
Divide the target’s DR by this number before subtracting it from your damage. (B268). and round DOWN – Minimum 0 (B378).
For example, a divisor of (2) would halve DR. A fractional divisor increases DR: (0.5) multiplies DR by 2
Explosive attacks (optional house rule: area effect attacks) only apply to the target of a direct hit. (B269)
Afflictions: divide the DR before determining modifiers to the HT roll. (B269)

shots-tooltip:
무기를 장전하기 전까지 사격할 수 있는
탄의 수입니다.

필요한 준비 행동 수를 나타냅니다.

bulk-tooltip:
이동공격: 장거리 공격을 할 때,
-2 혹은 덩치 만큼의 페널티를 받습니다.
더 낮은 쪽의 수치를 적용합니다(기본 p.365, 469, 548).
육박전: 장거리 무기를 사용 중일 때,
기존의 속력/거리 페널티 대신 무기의
덩치 페널티를 명중 판정에 적용합니다. 기본 p.391 참조.
은닉 판정으로 무기를 숨길 때의
페널티로도 적용됩니다. 기본 p.270 참조.
recoil-tooltip:
연사율 2 이상으로 사격할 때, 반동 수치와

최대 명중 발수는 발사한 탄수와 같습니다.
기본 p.373 참조.
malfunction-tooltip:
Malfunction is an Optional Rule. B278, B279, B382, tables B407 & HT179, with more detailed info HT79-81. If the option Use Malfunction is
checked [see Sheet Options page], and if the # entered here is greater than 0, then the roll result will check for weapon malfunction.
Malfunction has "priority" over a critical miss: if both would occur, only the malfunction takes place. See Critical Misses B382.
verify-malfunction-tooltip: If Verify is checked, then roll again to verify the malfunction. see HT79

Strength Modifier to distance only
Throwing or Throwing Art at DX Level = +1 ST

Each level of Super Throw, double range.

공격자와 목표 사이의 거리입니다.

(2 mph = 1 yard/second).

shotgun-notes-description:
Enter the stats of the shotgun, be sure to use half-damage range. The tool will calculate how 
close you need to be with the shotgun, the RoF, close range damage, and DR multiplier.
For more information, see B409.
yards-fallen-tooltip:
Controlled Fall Acrobatics skill to land properly can reduce fall by 5 yards.
If falling into water, you can attempt an Acrobatic skill or proper dive/ditch.
Dive/Ditch Swimming or Vehicle skill minus the speed penalty from Size and Speed/Range Table B550.
On a successful roll, you take no damage. B431
atmosphere-tooltip: Atmosphere is used to determine the Terminal Velocity Multiplier. (B431)
falling-velocity-tooltip:
Velocity is Yards Per Second (1 Yard Per Second is about 2 MPH B430).
See Velocity Table and Formula on B430.
If collision, use relative velocity.
Head-on collision = Add velocity of both objects
Rearend collision = Faster object - slower object
Side collision = Speed of object causing collision.
B432
terminal-velocity-tooltip:
Terminal Velocity Multiplier
Terminal Velocity On Earth, human-shaped 60 (spread-eagle) to 100 (dive) yards/second. Dense objects can be up to 200 yards/second or more. (B431).
Use the multiplier below to determine the new terminal velocity.
falling-hit-points-tooltip:
Hit Points of falling object or object initiating
collision.
NOTE: If collision and if the target object is moving
it will inflict its own damage to object that initiated
the collision.
See B430
hard-object-tooltip: If hitting a hard object (clay, concrete, soil, sand, etc.), check the box to double the effective Hit Points of the falling object or the object that caused the collision. B431
demolition-select-tooltip: Select an explosion type to use. This will populate Type and REF fields.
relative-explosive-force-tooltip:
Relative Explosive Force, equivalence in pounds of TNT.
TNT = 1.0. See B415.
demolition-pounds-tooltip: Weight in required by its REF.
damage-multiplier-tooltip:
피해 배수:
6d6 옆에 곱할 숫자를 입력하십시오.
6dxn 파괴력의 폭발을 내려면(nxn)/TNT 4파운드만큼이 필요합니다.
참고: 폭발에 휘말린 사람은 엎드려 피하기
능동방어로 엄폐물에 뛰어들어 폭발이나 파편 피해를 입지 않을 수 있습니다.
엎드려 피하기 기본 p.377 참조.
radius-collateral-damage-tooltip:
파괴 반경입니다. 기본 p.414 참조.
예를 들어 폭발이 6dx2짜리 파괴력이라면,
24m 안의 모든 사람이 영향을 받습니다.

파편 피해의 반경은 5x파편피해입니다.
demolition-armor-devisor-tooltip:
관통력입니다. 관통력은 폭심지로부터의 거리만큼 영향을 받습니다.
기본 p.414 참조.
입력 수치: 3 (디폴트), 2, or 1.
디폴트: 파괴력 / (3 x 폭심지 거리).
폭발 변형, 기본 p.107 참조.
폭발 +100% = 파괴력 / (2 x 폭심지 거리).
폭발 +150% = 파괴력 / (1 x 폭심지 거리).
demolition-target-tooltip:
폭심지와 목표 사이의 거리입니다.
파괴력 / (3 x 폭심지 거리), 소수점은 버립니다.
기본 p.414 참조.
demolition-how-much-tooltip:
폭발물을 얼마나 썼는지 피해량에 기반해 정합니다. TNT = 1.0
기본 p.415 참조.
demolition-how-big-tooltip:
폭발이 얼마나 큰지 중량에 따라 정합니다.
기본 p.415 참조.
fragmentation-skill-tooltip:
Base skill level for a fragmentation damage to hit a target.
A hit is automatic if the explosive attack actually strikes the target.
Only three modifiers apply: the range modifier for the distance from the center
of the blast to the target, the modifier for the target’s posture (prone, etc.),
and the target’s Size Modifier. It is possible for several fragments to hit! For
every three points by which the attack roll succeeds, one additional fragment
strikes the target.
inventory-carried-tooltip:
Carried
Check this box if the item is being carried.
Note: This may affect your Encumbrance Levels which may also affect Move and Dodge scores.
gravity-tooltip:
Standard gravity is based on 1G, earth normal.
If gravity is over 1G, then add your weight and encumberance then multiply by Gravity - 1. Add this value to your encumbrance.
If gravity is less than 1G, multiply the weight of your gear by the Gravity value, this is your new encumbrance.
See B350.
total-inventory-value-tooltip: (실제로 가지고 있든 아니든)소지중인 모든 물건의 금전적 가치입니다.

재능, 다른 기능이나 테크닉의 디폴트, 장비,

GM만 당신의 기능 실력과

custom-rolls-tooltip:
Use this option to use a custom macro with the Roll Template.

Important: When entering the macro, be sure to add a space character to the end!

Add a Button Label to display a button in the header.

For example, the Private Rolls option adds /w gm to the beginning of the roll, which means whisper to GM.

Another example is adding a blind roll option, where only the GM sees the roll. This example uses the Blind Roll API script, see https://app.roll20.net/forum/permalink/5064809/.
Set Label = Blind Roll, set Macro = !broll
macro-label-tooltip:
NOTE: In order to use this option, you will need an API script that can intercept the data for the roll and then send a message to the GM.

For an example, see the Blind Roll API script, https://app.roll20.net/forum/permalink/5064809/
point-summary-detailed-tooltip:
Custom view displaying each section total.

private-speed-tracker-tooltip: Show basic speed and add to Chat message to GM.
